title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Keyboard

Easy to use. Comfortable to type on. Built to last.

What it is:
- A full-size keyboard that plugs into a USB port.
- Works with Windows and Mac computers. Also works with Xbox and PlayStation for typing and simple use.

Easy on the hands:
- Light, gentle key press with a soft click you can feel. This makes it easier to know when a key has been pressed without pushing hard.
- A soft, magnetic wrist rest supports your palms to reduce strain and improve comfort.

Clear and helpful:
- Small screen on the keyboard (an OLED display) can show simple messages, volume, or helpful notes. You can ignore it if you don’t want it.

Built strong:
- Metal frame made from aircraft‑grade aluminum. This means it is sturdy and won’t flex.
- IP32 water resistance helps protect against small spills.

See your keys:
- Each key lights up. You can choose colors or set them to be bright and easy to see. Great for low‑light rooms.

Simple setup:
- Plug the USB cable into your computer or console. No extra power needed.
- Works right away. Optional software lets you change light colors and what the small screen shows.

Size:
- About 35 inches wide and 12 inches deep. Low profile design.

Good for:
- Everyday typing, email, and web browsing.
- Games, if you enjoy them.

In short:
This keyboard is comfortable, sturdy, and easy to see. It’s simple to plug in and start using, and it adds helpful lighting and a small information screen without being complicated. A dependable choice for daily use.
